variants.desc: Dominant hand in the B handshape, palm forward, fingertips start at the temple and move outward and up a little.

usage.english: Hello, Brad. Nice to meet you again.
usage.asl: Hello B-r-a-d. Nice to meet you again.

variants.desc: Dominant hand in the 5 handshape is in front of the torso and makes a waving movement.
variants.aid: Think of waving hello to someone.

variants.desc: Dominant hand in the 5 handshape is in front of the torso and makes a sliding movement from the non dominant side to the dominant side.
variants.aid: Think of waving hello to someone.
Fingerspell the letters that make up the word.
